entity.name: The White House

text: @WhiteHouse This is fake news. We're now predicted to have DOUBLE the fatalities in Aug as previously estimated. 135,000 DEAD by first week of Aug... AT BEST. The federal gov has failed to protect our country. https://t.co/VdMTu79P2k
